thread.title: Elbit nears purchase of Universal Avionics after govt approvals

title: Elbit nears purchase of Universal Avionics after govt approvals
text: March 22, 2018 / 7:17 AM / in 26 minutes Elbit nears purchase of Universal Avionics after govt approvals Reuters Staff 1 Min Read JERUSALEM, March 22 (Reuters) - * Israeli defence electronics firm Elbit Systems said on Thursday it was in the process of completing the acquisition of privately held U.S.-based Universal Avionics Systems Corp through an asset allocation agreement. * Elbit said the parties received the necessary government approvals for the transaction. * The closing of the deal is expected in the coming weeks, Elbit said. * Elbit did not provide further details. (Reporting by Steven Scheer)
